page.title: 09WATNALL MARKET
page.content: {Watnall Market},which is one of the main events in Watnall, is situated east of the{M1 Motorway}bridge and is on the site of the old{Watnall {Brickyard.}It is open on Sundays and most Bank Holiday Mondays from about 10a.m. till 4 p.m. Car parking is rough but plentiful and the charge is 10p.If you would like a reasonably sized stall on the market it costs Â£6.00. There is a vast range of stalls, most of them selling clothes but there are many others.It has been going for about a year.The{brickyard} is owned by a gipsy who is thought to be a millionaire.There is free transport from{Nottingham.} { }
